Articles.Content:
Im looking for some research paper ideas. Im 1st year in college and its for my english class, but I want to write about something about space, space exploration, etc...

I thought this might be a good place to ask. I just have never written a paper like this before and Im having a hard time narrowing it down to something I can actually find sources and write about.

Thanks!

-Rassa
Plan a potential mission to a celestial body, how a space colony might function, comparisons to past expl.
